text: David Clifford Wickersham (September 27, 1935 - June 18, 2022) was an American professional baseball pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) from 1960 to 1969 for the Kansas City Athletics, Detroit Tigers, Pittsburgh Pirates, and Kansas City Royals. Wickersham was born in Erie, Pennsylvania. Wickersham died on June 18, 2022 in Kansas City, Missouri at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== *Baseball Library *Retrosheet Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Kansas City Athletics players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:People from Erie, Pennsylvania
title: Dave Wickersham
